apps.localizedDescription:
-Minecraft    
 What's new in version 1.11.4?
 Cross-platform play for up to eight players across
 Windows 10 PCs, Android devices, iOS phones and tablets, Xbox One, and virtual reality platforms. Massive online multiplayer servers! 
 We've added a server browser to the main menu so you can 
 socialize, play, and collaborate with millions of other players.
apps.name: Minecraft
apps.subtitle: Minecraft
